name: Erathostenes

effects.actions: {i=2; print("Prime numbers lesser than 100 are:"); while(i<100){ 	j=2; 	ok=1; 	while(j*j<=i) 	{ 		if(i%j==0){ 			ok=0; 			break(); 		} 		j=j+1; 	} 	if(ok==1) 	{ 		output(i); 	} 	i=i+1; }}

description: Tells you some prime numbers. Not that it will help you a lot in a card game, but who doesn't like prime numbers :D ?
